price: Na ni vya Mwenyezi Mungu viliomo katika mbingu na viliomo katika ardhi. Na Mwenyezi Mungu anatosha kuwa Mlinzi.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
footnotes: Kupanga kila kitu cha mbinguni na duniani ni kazi ya Mwenyezi Mungu Aliye takasika na Aliye tukuka. Yeye ndiye Mwenye madaraka, Mwenye kuendesha, Mwenye kupanga. Yatosha kuwa Yeye ndiye Mtawala aliye amrisha ulimwengu ukajipanga ulivyo jipanga, na akawaamrisha watu wamuabudu, na wamtegemezee Yeye mambo yao, na wamche Yeye.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
